name: In my Father's House are Many Rooms
name_original: In my Father's House are Many Rooms
description:
Princess Marissa von Teufelwald has never wanted for anything in her short life, even though she's never left her nursery.  But when her favorite doll disappears, she's forced to undertake a strange and dangerous journey out into the wider house... a journey that will reveal the truth about herself, her home, and the family that she's never met.

In my Father's House are Many Rooms is a point-and-click pixel horror game made in RPG Maker VX Ace.

Sprites and tilesets Horror City and Slasher Forest courtesy of VexedEnigma: https://vexedenigma.itch.io/

Music courtesy of Eric Matyas: http://soundimage.org/
